parameters.content:
## Try It Out!

**Launch your first AI agent‚Äîa chatbot that uses tools to fetch live info, send emails, and automate tasks.**

### To get started:
1.  **Connect Gemini** (see red sticky note below)
2.  Click the **üó® Open chat** button and try asking:
    *   ‚ÄúWhat‚Äôs the weather in Paris?‚Äù
    *   ‚ÄúGet me the latest tech news.‚Äù
    *   ‚ÄúGive me ideas for n8n AI agents.‚Äù

### Questions or Feedback?
For feedback, coaching, buit-for-you workflows or any questions, use my unified AI-powered contact form.

‚û°Ô∏è **[Get in Touch Here](https://api.ia2s.app/form/templates/academy)**

*Happy Automating! ‚ÄîLucas Peyrin*
üí° Later, activate this workflow and share the public chat URL to let others talk to your AI Agent!

Your AI agent can:
1. **Receive** messages from the chat
2. **Select** the right tools (e.g., weather, news, email)
3. **Respond** with live, helpful answers


**Open the AI agent node** and edit the **System Message** to adjust your agent‚Äôs thinking, behavior, and replies.
This node helps your agent remember the last few messages to stay on topic.

These tools let your agent access real-world data or take actions. Add more to expand its abilities!

Click the ‚ûï under the agent‚Äôs Tool input to add:
- Google Calendar (Get Upcoming Events)
- Gmail (Send an Email) (Gmail)

parameters.toolDescription: Get weather forecast anywhere, anytime. You can make requests by assuming most information, the only thing you need is the location (use the city name to infer lat and long automatically) and time period (assume today if not specified)

parameters.name: latitude
parameters.value: ={{ /*n8n-auto-generated-fromAI-override*/ $fromAI('parameters0_Value', `Latitude of the location, e.g. 45.75 for Lyon. Do not ask the user just infer it automatically.`, 'string') }}

parameters.name: longitude
parameters.value: ={{ /*n8n-auto-generated-fromAI-override*/ $fromAI('parameters1_Value', `Longitude of the location, e.g. 4.85 for Lyon. Do not ask the user just infer it automatically.`, 'string') }}

parameters.name: current
hourly
daily
end_date
parameters.value: ={{ /*n8n-auto-generated-fromAI-override*/ $fromAI('parameters6_Value', `End date in YYYY-MM-DD format. Must be after start_date. Example: 2025-07-18`, 'string') }}

options.subtitle: This is for demo purposes. Try me out !
options.title: Your first AI Agent üöÄ

parameters.content:
1. [In Google AI Studio](https://aistudio.google.com/app/apikey) click **‚ÄúCreate API key in new project‚Äù** and copy it.

2. Open the ```Connect Gemini``` node:
   * **Select Credential ‚Üí Create New**
   * Paste into **API Key** and **Save**
